feed.title: NetBird Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for NetBird: v0.29.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [client] Ensure engine is stopped before starting it back by @hurricanehrndz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2565
  • [relay] Change heartbeat timeout by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2598
  • [client] Fix blocked net.Conn Close call by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2600
  • [management] Add command flag to set metrics port for signal and relay service, and update management port by @benniekiss in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2599
  • [client] Fix get management and signal state race condition by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2570
  • [management] fix legacy decrypting of empty values by @bcmmbaga in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2595
  • [signal] Fix signal active peers metrics by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2591
  • [management] Add transaction to addPeer by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2469
  • [client] Fix leaked server connections by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2596
  • [client] Enforce permissions on Win by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2568
  • [relay] Add health check attempt threshold by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2609
  • [client] Fix race condition while read/write conn status in peer conn by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2607
  • [client] Cancel the context of wg watcher when the go routine exit by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2612

Full Changelog: https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/compare/v0.29.2...v0.29.3

entry.title: New release for NetBird: v0.29.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Do not block the msg receiving if the wg proxy does not operate by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2617
  • Exit from processConnResults after all tries by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2621

Full Changelog: https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/compare/0.29.3...v0.29.4

entry.title: New release for NetBird: v0.30.0
entry.content:
Release Notes for v0.30.0

What's New

Access Control for Network Routes

Starting with version 0.30.0, users can assign access control groups to network routes, offering improved security and traffic restrictions. Route access is now unidirectional, ensuring traffic complies with the specified policies before authorization. This feature enhances the flexibility of network management.

To configure this, follow the documentation: Configuring routes with access control.

Improvements

  • Add Access Control for Network Routes: [management, client] Add access control support to network routes #2100
  • Remove Redundant Account Token Calls: [management] Remove redundant get account calls in GetAccountFromToken #2615
  • Refactor User JWT Group Synchronization: [management] Refactor User JWT group sync #2690

Bug Fixes

  • Anonymize Relay Address in Peers View: [client] Anonymize relay address in status peers view #2640
  • Check WireGuard Interface Instead of Engine Context: [client] Check wginterface instead of engine ctx #2676
  • Close Remote Connection in Proxy: [client] Close the remote conn in proxy #2626
  • Fix eBPF Close Function: [client] Fix ebpf close function #2672
  • Fix Relay Disconnection Handling: [client] Fix Relay disconnection handling #2680
  • Restrict Peer Access for Non-Admins: [management] Restrict accessible peers to user-owned peers for non-admins #2618

Other Changes

  • Adjust Relay Worker Log Levels: [client] Adjust relay worker log level and message #2683
  • Improve Error Count Formatting: [client] Fix error count formatting #2641
  • Refactor Interface Package: [client] Refactor/iface pkg #2646
  • Remove Custom Localhost Dialer: [client] Remove usage of custom dialer for localhost #2639
  • Add Account Existence Check to AccountManager: [management] Add AccountExists to AccountManager #2694
  • Add DB Retrieval Method: [management] Add get DB method to store #2650
  • Fix Account Manager Mock Implementation: [management] Fix account manager mock #2695
  • Propagate Management Metrics: [management] Propagate metrics #2667
  • Remove File Store in Management: [management] Remove file store #2689
  • Update Management Docker Image: [management] Update management base docker image #2687
  • Improve ZITADEL IDP Error Handling: [management] improve zitadel idp error response detail #2634
  • Add Log Setting to Caddy Container: [misc] Add log setting to Caddy container #2684
  • Fix IP Range Posture Check Example: [misc] Fix ip range posture check example in API doc #2628
  • Update to Goreleaser Version 2: [misc] Specify goreleaser version and update to 2 #2673
  • Use Packages to Fetch Latest Version: [misc] Use the pkgs to get the latest version #2682
  • Move Signal Message Handling into Dispatcher: [signal] Move dummy signal message handling into dispatcher #2686
  • Propagate Signal Metrics: [signal] Propagate metrics #2668
  • Add Context to Signal Dispatcher: [signal] add context to signal-dispatcher #2662

New Contributors

  • @adasauce made their first contribution in #2634
  • @simen64 made their first contribution in #2678

Full Changelog: v0.29.4...v0.30.0

entry.title: New release for NetBird: v0.30.1
entry.content:
This release fixes a few issues with the network route access controls and a bug with Signal service.

What's Changed

  • [management] Remove admin check on getAccountByID by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2699
  • [management] Validate peer ownership during login by @bcmmbaga in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2704
  • [client] Limit P2P attempts and restart on specific events by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2657
  • [management] Propagate error in store errors by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2709
  • [misc] Add Link to the Lawrence Systems video by @braginini in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2711
  • [management] Make max open db conns configurable by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2713
  • [management] Add support to envsub go management configurations by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2708
  • [management] Move testdata to sql files by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2693
  • [client] Improve route acl by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2705
  • [signal] new signal dispatcher version by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2722

Full Changelog: https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/compare/v0.30.0...v0.30.1

entry.title: New release for NetBird: v0.30.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [relay, client] Relay/fix/wg roaming by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2691
  • [management] Refactor getAccountIDWithAuthorizationClaims by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2715
  • [client] Add table filter rules using iptables by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2727
  • [relay-server] Move the handshake logic to a separated struct by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2648
  • [management] Add session expire functionality based on inactivity by @ctrl-zzz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2326
  • [client] Add universal bin build and update sign workflow version by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2738
  • [client] Exclude loopback from NAT by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2747
  • [misc] Update Zitadel version on quickstart script by @eoksum in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2744
  • [management] Fix JSON function compatibility for SQLite and PostgreSQL by @bcmmbaga in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2746

New Contributors

  • @eoksum made their first contribution in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2744

Full Changelog: https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/compare/v0.30.1...v0.30.2
